settings.title: Coming Soon
settings.newsletter_subheading: Subscribe to be the first to hear about our exclusive offers and latest arrivals.

settings.slide_copy: Like a personal coat of arms, our quintessential state license plate collection brings history, memories, and state pride into one timeless style.
Each state has put its unique mark on history and the people who were born there. Our Iconic collection salutes your state’s values, slogans, and most cherished icons.
Blending your state map with the American Flag emblem, the Flagship collection is all about what brings our country together as unique pieces of a whole.

settings.title: custom orders
settings.copy: Want something unique? Put your personal stamp on our stunning custom headwear patches.

settings.title: our story
settings.copy:
Sometimes home is where you live, and sometimes it’s that place you long to return to. Our story began with creating apparel to help people celebrate hometown pride with classic state license plates, and it all grew from there. We’ve expanded our collections to capture the symbols that unite Americans in their home states and beyond.

Wherever home is to you, let Vintage State help capture your memories and tell your story.

settings.title: flash sale
settings.subtitle: code: drinkup
settings.copy: 25% off all drinkware products. Use code at checkout.

settings.title: Custom leather patch creations to fit your personal or brand needs.
settings.text: If a home state patch from one of our collections isn’t fully capturing your story, fill out our custom order form. We’d love to work with you!
